Title: Establishes the offenses of destruction of police property in the first, second, third and fourth degrees
Summary: Establishes the offenses of destruction of police property in the first, second, third and fourth degrees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the offenses of destruction of police property in the fourth degree, destruction of police property in the third degree, destruction of police property in the second degree and destruction of police property in the first degree
